function.name: airConditioningMode_getValue
function.description: This function is used to retrieve the current operation mode of the air conditioner via a voice command. E.g. auto, windfree, etc

location.description: The location where the air conditioner is located. e.g. home, office, etc.

room.description: The room where the air conditioner is located. e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

device.description: The name of the air conditioner whose operation mode needs to be checked. e.g. AC1, standing air conditioner, etc.
